name: Air Fryer Cheeseburgers
author: Yoly
summary: I like the fact that by air frying my burgers I avoid grease splattering all over my stove top. I make 1/2-pound burger patties but you can easily make them into four 1/4-pound patties. Serve with all the fixings on the side.
directions: Preheat the air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cut crust off sandwich bread and tear bread into small pieces
Mix with milk, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl until well incorporated
Add ground beef and mix well
Make an indentation in the center of each patty with your thumb; this prevents them from puffing up
Place in the air fryer basket and cook for 8 to 10 minutes
Flip patties over and continue cooking on the second side, 8 to 10 minutes more
Top each patty with cheese and place back in the air fryer until cheese has started to melt, 20 to 30 seconds
